revision.comment: Mention the version with a second gen alexa voice remote
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amazon |model=Fire TV Stick |revision=Gen 2 (LY73PR) |asin=B0791TX5P5,B00ZV9RDKK |is_manuf=No |type=media streamer, computer-on-a-stick, |fcc_id=2AE6S-0948 |fcc_date=09/14/2017 |flags=Bluetooth 4.1, HDMI out, Alexa |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Mediatek |cpu1_model=MT8127D |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=00:FC:8B }} {{TagLine|Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote}}
*Fire TV Stick (Basic Edition, Gen 2) :Streaming Media Player :Alexa Voice Remote
This 2nd Generation Fire TV Stick was refreshed with a 2nd Gen Alexa Voice Remote. * First Gen Alexa Voice Remote: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00ZV9RDKK?tag=wiki085-20 B00ZV9RDKK] * Second Gen Alexa Voice Remote: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0791TX5P5?tag=wiki085-20 B0791TX5P5]
===Specifications=== [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/fire-tv/device-specifications.html Device Specifications (Amazon Fire TV)] *System on Chip (SoC) Platform: [[MediaTek]] MT8127D *CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.3GHz *GPU: Mali-450 MP4; Bluetooth: BT 4.1 (no LE) *Storage: 8GB (internal); Memory: 1GB (DDR3) *Networking: 2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn/ac (2x2 MIMO) *Ports: HDMI output, Micro USB 2.0 for power only *Device OS/Platform software: :Fire OS 5 - Based on Android 5.0 (API Level 22) *Screen resolution (px) and Refresh rate (Hz): :1920x1080 (1080p)/60Hz, 1280x720 (720p)/60Hz *HDCP: 1.4; Density (dp): 320 (1080p), 213 (720p) *Density Identifier: xhdpi (1080p), tvdpi (720p)
===See also=== *[[Amazon Fire TV Devices]] â€¢ [[Amazon Echo Devices]] *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick (Basic Edition)]] (November 2017) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT8127D; GPU: Mali-450 MP4 :CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV (Gen 3)]] (October 2017) :SoC: [[Amlogic]] S905Z; GPU: Mali-450 MP3 :CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A53 @1.5GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV Edition]] (May 2017) :SoC: [[MStar]]-T1 938 (MSDUAV16B-A-008T) :GPU: Mali-T820-MP3; BT 4.1, USB 2.0/3.0 :CPU: Dual Core ARM Cortex-A72 @1.5GHz :+ Dual Core ARM Cortex-A53 @1.1GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick (LY73PR)|Amazon Fire TV Stick (Gen 2)]] (LY73PR) (September 2016) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT8127D; GPU: Mali-450 MP4 :CPU: Quad Core ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz *[[Amazon Fire TV (Gen 2)]] (December 2015) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT8173C; GPU: PowerVR Rogue GX6250 :CPU: Quad Core (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A72 @2GHz) :+ (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A53 @1.573 GHz) big-Little *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick Gen 1 (W87CUN)]] (November 2014) :SoC: [[Broadcom]] BCM28155 (Capri) :CPU: Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 @1GHz :GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore IV GPU/VPU (Capri VC4) *[[Amazon Fire TV (CL1130)|Amazon Fire TV (Gen 1)]] (CL1130) (April 2014) :SoC: [[Qualcomm]] APQ8064T (Snapdragon) :CPU: Quad Core Krait 300 @1.7GHz :GPU: Qualcomm Adreno 320 *[[Amazon Fire Phone (SD4930UR)]] <!-- *[[Amazon Fire TV (CL1130)]] (Gen 1) *[[Amazon Fire TV Stick (LY73PR)]] (Gen 2) -->
